text: Is there any good mocking framework/library for testing? I have seen Mocking.jl and SimpleMock.jl, but neither of them 1) work and 2) work the way I want them to. I think SimpleMock.jl could be a good starting point, but Cassette.jl is broken in a few key ways.

elements.text: Is there any good mocking framework/library for testing? I have seen Mocking.jl and SimpleMock.jl, but neither of them 1) work and 2) work the way I want them to. I think SimpleMock.jl could be a good starting point, but Cassette.jl is broken in a few key ways.

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
Those are really the only ones, they each have their own flaws haha
